languages.text: "Впрочем, в сообщении господина Скаландра указано, что ответ на призыв о помощи вряд ли будет расценен как вторжение на чужую территорию... Вероятнее всего, губернатор Грантиса отправит сигнал сразу же, когда начнется рейд — если ваш пустотный корабль окажется поблизости, никто не усомнится в причинах, побудивших вас высадиться на планете".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, в сообщении господина Скаландра указано, что ответ на призыв о помощи вряд ли будет расценен как вторжение на чужую территорию... Вероятнее всего, губернатор Грантиса отправит сигнал сразу же, когда начнется рейд — если ваш пустотный корабль окажется поблизости, никто не усомнится в причинах, побудивших вас высадиться на планете".

languages.text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, в сообщении господина Скаландра указано, что ответ на призыв о помощи вряд ли будет расценен как вторжение на чужую территорию... Вероятнее всего, губернатор Грантиса отправит сигнал сразу же, когда начнется рейд — если ваш пустотный корабль окажется поблизости, никто не усомнится в причинах, побудивших вас высадиться на планете".

traits.locale_text: "Master Scalander remarks that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for help the moment the raid begins — and if your void vessel happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

"Master Scalander remarks that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for help the moment the raid begins — and if your void vessel happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

"Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

"Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

"Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

languages.text: “斯卡兰德大师在信息中指出，回应求救信号不太可能会被误解为入侵领土。格兰蒂斯的总督很可能会在袭击开始时发布求救信号。如果您的虚空舰刚好在附近，应该没有人会质疑您登陆的理由。”
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

traits.locale_text: “斯卡兰德大师在信息中指出，回应求救信号不太可能会被误解为入侵领土。格兰蒂斯的总督很可能会在袭击开始时发布求救信号。如果您的虚空舰刚好在附近，应该没有人会质疑您登陆的理由。”

languages.text: «El maestro Scalander añadió en su mensaje que responder a una llamada de auxilio no suele considerarse como incursión en territorio ajeno. El gobernador de Grantis enviará una solicitud de ayuda en cuanto empiece el asalto, sin duda, y, si resulta que su nave se encuentra cerca en ese momento, nadie cuestionará sus motivos para aterrizar».
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Scalander añadió en su mensaje que responder a una llamada de auxilio no suele considerarse como incursión en territorio ajeno. El gobernador de Grantis enviará una solicitud de ayuda en cuanto empiece el asalto, sin duda, y, si resulta que su nave se encuentra cerca en ese momento, nadie cuestionará sus motivos para aterrizar».

languages.text: "Meister Scalander bemerkte in seiner Nachricht, dass die Beantwortung eines Notrufs wohl nicht als Eindringen in fremdes Territorium angesehen wird. Der Gouverneur von Grantis wird höchstwahrscheinlich einen Hilferuf senden, sobald der Überfall beginnt – und wenn Euer Raumschiff zufällig in der Nähe ist, wird niemand Eure Gründe für die Landung infrage stellen."
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

traits.locale_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

languages.text: « Maître Scalander souligne dans son message que répondre à un appel de détresse a peu de chance d'être perçu comme une incursion sur le territoire d'un rival. Les autorités de Grantis lanceront certainement un appel de détresse dès le début du raid... Alors, si votre vaisseau spatial se trouve à proximité, personne ne trouvera rien à redire à votre intervention. »
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Scalander souligne dans son message que répondre à un appel de détresse a peu de chance d'être perçu comme une incursion sur le territoire d'un rival. Les autorités de Grantis lanceront certainement un appel de détresse dès le début du raid... Alors, si votre vaisseau spatial se trouve à proximité, personne ne trouvera rien à redire à votre intervention. »

languages.text: 「スカランダー殿はメッセージで、救難信号に応じることで、他所の領地に侵入したとみなされる可能性は低いと話しています。グランティス総督はおそらく、襲撃が起こればすぐに救援要請を出すでしょうーーあなたのヴォイドシップがたまたま近くにいても、着陸した理由を疑問に思う者は誰もいません」
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."

traits.locale_text: 「スカランダー殿はメッセージで、救難信号に応じることで、他所の領地に侵入したとみなされる可能性は低いと話しています。グランティス総督はおそらく、襲撃が起こればすぐに救援要請を出すでしょうーーあなたのヴォイドシップがたまたま近くにいても、着陸した理由を疑問に思う者は誰もいません」

languages.text: "Üstat Scalander; yardım çağrısına yanıt vermenin, başka birinin sahasına izinsiz girmek şeklinde değerlendirilme olasılığının düşük olduğunu da belirtti. Grantis valisi, büyük ihtimalle baskın başladığı an yardım çağrısı gönderecektir ve uçsuz geminiz o sırada yakınlarda olursa kimse oraya iniş yapma sebeplerinizi sorgulamayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander noted in his message that responding to a distress call is unlikely to be considered an incursion into somebody else's territory. The governor of Grantis will most likely send out a call for aid the moment the raid begins — and if your voidship happens to be nearby, no one will question your reasons for landing."
